name: Jellink
description:
Hello everyone !

I'm very proud to present "Jellink" a puzzle game I created on Game Maker. 

In Jellink you control several characters simultaneously. But be careful ! If one of them dies, the level starts again.

So you have to rack your brains to solve the 20 puzzles that make up the game.

The mechanics are diverse and evolving, new challenges will constantly energize your adventure!

  • 20 levels
  • Different evolutionary mechanisms 

Everything was done by me, alone.
